module: Module-level comment: This soc_system module implements a System-on-Chip design integrating an HPS, memory interfaces, and peripheral controllers. It uses AXI and Avalon interfaces to interconnect components, manages memory operations, handles various I/O interfaces (Ethernet, USB, UART, etc.), and controls LED and 7-segment displays. The module orchestrates communication between the HPS and FPGA fabric, providing a comprehensive platform for embedded applications.
